summary: Three children are born at the height of an eclipse of the sun. Ten years later, they begin to murder the people around them - even their family members.
cast: Lori Lethin|Melinda Cordell|Julie Brown|Joe Penny|Bert Kramer|K.C. Martel|Elizabeth Hoy|Billy Jayne|Andrew Freeman|Susan Strasberg|José Ferrer|Ben Marley|Erica Hope|Ellen Geer|Daniel Currie|William Boyett|Shane Butterworth|Ward Costello|Michael Dudikoff|Cyril O'Reilly|Georgie Paul|Norman Rice|Ruth Silveira|Sylvia Wright|John Avery|Nathan Roberts
title: Cumpleaños sangriento
